column4: help anyone:  i upgraded ubuntu to 9.10 on my desktop and laptop and BOTH machines no longer have audio.  output is shown as "dummy output" only.  any ideas anyone?
Many people have had issues with 9.10 after upgrading from 9.04!
this is preposterous how many bugs there are in 9.10 -- 9.04 was far more stable
You just checked out the notes or something?
